content.text: Muadib is an interactive website, providing tools and information for players.
Muadib offers a variety of commands to diffrent tools. Type commands in the input box or select from suggestions.

items: /builder - Open the Dune Awakening base builder

content.text: Muadib is named after the desert mouse, as they point the way to water. /n And this website is here to help you find your way in the desert of Dune Awakening.
This website was developed for Dune Awakening fans. /n Contributions and suggestions are welcome! /n Contant me on Discord: @Konijnebeer /n For bug reports use the GitHub issue tracker.
